title: Tahm Kench keeps “eating” minions
body:
Since the update where his w has no cooldown after his ult, if you devour a minion straight away Tahm Kench will just “eat it” , no gold, ability on cooldown, the minion just disappears.
It also happens a lot in lane with low hp minions, it actually happened so often that i have about a dozen examples from the same match.
Also, when you devour an ally straight after ult you cant seem to be able to spit him back manually, i dont know if the ally can click out of your devour but if he doesnt you need to wait the entire duration of your devour.
Furthermore, enemy minions are also still sometimes exploding as soon as you spit them, but it only happened a handful of times since the update.

replies.body: I played a couple rounds of Tahm Kench top lane about a week ago, and I noticed that whenever I went to eat a minion (mostly cannon/siege minions) he just digests the minion, and leaves me with 50 less gold.
